text: Carlos Cámara Jr. (born 1 December 1956) is a Venezuelan actor. He appeared in more than twenty telenovelas since 1981. Cámara was born into a family of actors. His parents Carlos Cámara and and his brother Víctor Cámara are also actors. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+TV ! Year ! Title ! title: Carlos Cámara Jr.
